title: 2nd Chance's list of fakin' good DS/3DS games
body:
[Blame CTElephant askin' for this](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/3XndGmio-help-me-decide?comment=00030000) in advance

~~Also, fak u, I ain't putting it in alphabetical order~~ Nvm thank busty for being triggered by it and doing it cuz I asked

Also also, I probably missed some shite, I'll add 'em as I remember (aka nag me)
